name: The Maze Runner (itch) (CaTBoNe Games)
description:
Please help the slime to find the chest in the dungeon while avoid bumping into the walls and traps as they will cause health deduction! Players have to navigate the slime by the buttons listed above in the maze/ below under "Controls". Check this out with your friends! This can be a single-player or multiplayer game:

  • For single-player mode, the player controls the character movement with the four buttons. 
  • For two-player mode, each player controls the character movement with two of the buttons (ie. player on the left uses E & X and player on the right uses I & M)
  • For four-player mode, each player controls the character movement with one of the buttons
Control:

Lower right - E
Lower left - I
Upper right - X
Upper left - M
